channel.title: DJ D's Retrocast
channel.description:
DJ D's Retrocast Is The Hottest, Coolest Old-School Podcast On The Net.
Spinning Your Favorite Pop, Disco, R&B, Dance & New Wave Remixes. From Disco Days to 90s Nights ! Special Emphasis On 80's & Female Artists.
Remixes - Rarities - Soundtrack Songs - The Greatest Of Hits
Be Sure To Check Out The Blog:
http://retro-remixes.blogspot.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Turning The Beat Around !
channel.itunes:author: DJ D
channel.itunes:summary:
DJ D's Retrocast Is The Hottest, Coolest Old-School Podcast On The Net.
Spinning Your Favorite Pop, Disco, R&B, Dance & New Wave Remixes. From Disco Days to 90s Nights ! Special Emphasis On 80's & Female Artists.
Remixes - Rarities - Soundtrack Songs - The Greatest Of Hits
Be Sure To Check Out The Blog:
http://retro-remixes.blogspot.com

item.title: A Very Retro Christmas
item.description: Stuff Your Stocking With Your Favorite Holiday Treats featuring: Band Aid - Wham! - Mariah Carey Madonna - Christina Aguilera - Ella Fitzgerald & Bing Crosby It's All You Want For Christmas!
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Stuff Your Stocking With Your Favorite Holiday Treats featuring:
Band Aid - Wham! - Mariah Carey Madonna - Christina Aguilera - Ella Fitzgerald & Bing Crosby
It's All You Want For Christmas!

item.title: '80's Pop Tarts
item.description: Hey, Mickey! Join us at Tom's Diner for a dose of your favorite '80's ladies in all their retro glory. Classic Chants by: Deborah Harry - Alison Moyet - Elisa Fiorillo Melissa Manchester - Toni Basil - Regina Catch the lights up on the ferris wheel!
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Hey, Mickey!
Join us at Tom's Diner for a dose of your favorite '80's ladies in all their retro glory.
Classic Chants by: Deborah Harry - Alison Moyet - Elisa Fiorillo Melissa Manchester - Toni Basil - Regina
Catch the lights up on the ferris wheel!

item.title: Disco Inferno - '70's Pop Groups
item.description: Young Men! There's No Need To Feel Down! Retrocast Takes a Hip Trip Back in Time to Celebrate Everyone's Favorite '70s Pop Groups. Classic Jams by: Village People - Doobie Brothers - Lipps, Inc. Three Dog Night - Wild Cherry - Stealers Wheel Listen to the Music. All the time!
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Young Men! There's No Need To Feel Down!
Retrocast Takes a Hip Trip Back in Time to Celebrate Everyone's Favorite '70s Pop Groups.
Classic Jams by:
Village People - Doobie Brothers - Lipps, Inc. Three Dog Night - Wild Cherry - Stealers Wheel
Listen to the Music. All the time!

item.title: Footloose
item.description: Kick Off Your Sunday Shoes and Revisit One Of The '80's Greatest Music Movies. Let's Hear It For The Boys (& Girls): Kenny Loggins Shalamar Bonnie Tyler Mike Reno Ann Wilson Deniece Williams Everybody Cut Loose!
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Kick Off Your Sunday Shoes and Revisit One Of The '80's Greatest Music Movies.
Let's Hear It For The Boys (& Girls):
Kenny Loggins Shalamar Bonnie Tyler Mike Reno Ann Wilson Deniece Williams
Everybody Cut Loose!

item.title: Culture Club
item.description: Who's Got the New Boy Gender ? Take a Tumble Back to the '80's with Your Favorite New Wave Pop Group. Experience The Best of Boy George & Culture Club Tracks in Remixed Form. Where Dreams Are Made of Emotion! Featuring: Church Of The Poison Mind (Razormaid Mix) Do You Really Want To Hurt Me (Deep Dish Quivvers Mix) I'll Tumble 4 Ya (Non-Radioband Mix) It's A Miracle (US 12 Inch Mix) Miss Me Blind (Ultimix Acid Flashback Mix) Mistake No. 3 (DJ Cobra Club Mix) Move Away (12 Inch Extended Mix) Time (Countdown To Arythmia Mix)
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Who's Got the New Boy Gender ?
Take a Tumble Back to the '80's with Your Favorite New Wave Pop Group. Experience The Best of Boy George & Culture Club Tracks in Remixed Form.
Where Dreams Are Made of Emotion!
Featuring:
Church Of The Poison Mind (Razormaid Mix) Do You Really Want To Hurt Me (Deep Dish Quivvers Mix) I'll Tumble 4 Ya (Non-Radioband Mix) It's A Miracle (US 12 Inch Mix) Miss Me Blind (Ultimix Acid Flashback Mix) Mistake No. 3 (DJ Cobra Club Mix) Move Away (12 Inch Extended Mix) Time (Countdown To Arythmia Mix)

item.title: '90's Pop Divas
item.description: Turn Around, Bright Eyes & Return To The Decade Where Women Ruled The Airwaves. Nothing Compares 2 Classic Tracks by: Jane Wiedlin - Rush Hour (Extended Mix) Nicki French - Total Eclipse Of The Heart (Techno Remix) Helen Terry featuring Boy George - Laughter On My Mind Robyn - Show Me Love (Stripped Show Mix) Julee Cruise - Rockin' Back Inside My Heart (Tibetan 12") Sinead O'Connor - Nothing Compares 2 U (Thee Werq'n Bitches EMO Anthem Mix) Jane Wiedlin - World On Fire (Justin Strauss Mix)
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Turn Around, Bright Eyes & Return To The Decade Where Women Ruled The Airwaves.

item.title: '80's Soul Brothers
item.description: Take A Groovin' Trip Back To The '80's With DJ D's Retrocast: '80's Soul Brothers Hear The Best Funk & R&B Classics By: Bobby Brown - Billy Ocean - Lionel Richie Tone Loc - Rockwell featuring Michael Jackson "No More Love On The Run !" Bobby Brown - Rock Wit'cha (Extended Mix) Billy Ocean - Caribbean - African - European Queen Lionel Richie - Dancing On The Ceiling Bobby Brown - On Our Own (12" Club Mix) Rockwell - Somebody's Watching Me (Special 12" Mix) Tone Loc - Funky Cold Medina (Diceman's Magic Cold Medina)
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
Take A Groovin' Trip Back To The '80's With DJ D's Retrocast: '80's Soul Brothers
Hear The Best Funk & R&B Classics By:
Bobby Brown - Billy Ocean - Lionel Richie Tone Loc - Rockwell featuring Michael Jackson
"No More Love On The Run !"
Bobby Brown - Rock Wit'cha (Extended Mix) Billy Ocean - Caribbean - African - European Queen Lionel Richie - Dancing On The Ceiling Bobby Brown - On Our Own (12" Club Mix) Rockwell - Somebody's Watching Me (Special 12" Mix) Tone Loc - Funky Cold Medina (Diceman's Magic Cold Medina)

item.title: Disco Inferno
item.description: "People Gettin' Loose, Ya'll. Gettin' Down On The Roof !" Return To The Days Of Disco With Your Favorite Dancefloor Burners. Classic Jams by: Chic - Earth, Wind & Fire Peaches & Herb - The Trammps "Twistin', Turnin'. We Keep Burnin' !" Contains Excerpts From: Chic - Everybody Dance (12" Mix) Earth Wind & Fire - September (Album Version) Peaches & Herb - Shake Your Groove Thing (12" Mix) The Trammps - Disco Inferno (12" Mix) Chic - Good Times (Radio Edit)
item.dc:creator: DJ D
item.itunes:summary:
"People Gettin' Loose, Ya'll. Gettin' Down On The Roof !"
Return To The Days Of Disco With Your Favorite Dancefloor Burners.
Classic Jams by: Chic - Earth, Wind & Fire Peaches & Herb - The Trammps
"Twistin', Turnin'. We Keep Burnin' !"

Chic - Everybody Dance (12" Mix) Earth Wind & Fire - September (Album Version) Peaches & Herb - Shake Your Groove Thing (12" Mix) The Trammps - Disco Inferno (12" Mix) Chic - Good Times (Radio Edit)
